text: Dr. D. V. Ravi Shankar, Principal, TKR College of Engineering & Technology had obtained his AMIE from Institution of Engineers in the year 1987. He completed his M.Tech in Materials Engineering from Regional Engineering College (REC) presently NIT, Suratkal in the year 1994. He presented his M.Tech thesis paper at ISRO, Bangalore. He obtained is Ph.D in the branch of Mechanical Engineering in the year 2010 from JNT University, Hyderabad under the guidance of Dr.P. Rami Reddy, former Registrar, JNTUH.
title: TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: He has totally 23 years of experience which includes 7 years of Industrial experience and 16 years academic experience. Under his able guidance 35 Projects had completed in UG level, 10 Projects in PG Level and presently guiding 8 Projects in Ph.D Level.
title: TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: He has won gold medals for three successive years at 35th, 36th and 39th All India Level Design Competitions organized by National Design and Research Forum, The Institution of Engineers (India).
title: TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Home to a 21,000 sq. ft. Research & Development center, the college fosters innovation through MSME incubation, startup support, and funded research projects.
title: TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Engineers play the most vital and important role in nation building. They create new inventions using best engineered technologies to make human life more comfortable, secure and productive. In modern times, nations which have rich engineering and experienced management domains are flourishing economically and are providing better lives to their people We have excellent potential to grow in diversified areas and excel in Engineering and Management fields. We need enormous number of engineers and managers to write next story of success.
title: TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: The essence of Engineering and Management education which has spread in India is a very positive sign not only to cater domestic needs but provide manpower to the entire world and become biggest technically trained community. TEEGALA KRISHNA REDDY EDUCATIONAL SOCIETY is a venture contributing to this Endeavour. We have started with full force to play a leading role in providing quality education and careers. We have identified the needs of modern engineering, technology and management education for modern age students, with a vision and mission accompanying transparency, accountability and accessibility which keeps us abreast and also ahead of our competitors.
title: TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: At the outset I send my greetings to the Editorial Board of TKRES Souvenir 2011, for working on a Magazine best in all aspects. We want to provide a complete package of educational services to TKRES students. I believe this magazine will provide us the benchmark for continued improvement in overall development of the College. This magazine should be a good source of guidance for faculty and coming batches of students in choosing activities of their choice in their future for building their careers. I appreciate the efforts of the Editorial team who have done an excellent job in compiling TKRES activities over the year and disseminate them through this Magazine as well as on the TKRES website.
title: TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: The college has a dedicated Training & Placement Cell focused on achieving 100% placement, with continuous student training and company tie-ups.
title: TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Offers add-on and bridge courses, mentorship programs, and personalized academic support—ensuring students thrive academically and professionally.
title: TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: The motive of TKRES is to develop a global perspective to cope -up with the fast changing technology scenario. In addition to this, values with discipline are the hallmark of our college, besides, ensuring quality of the students; here the emphasis is not only on academic excellence but the development of the overall total personality of a student. To achieve this goal, add on courses, training in personality development, and other soft skills are also provided in our College. We take special care to ensure that new ideas are not merely discussed here but executed. Execution of new ideas helps the faculty and students to tread the path of ‘Innovation’ which is the slogan of our Institution. As excellence is the only criterion for selection of students, we are confident that in due course, promises will become ‘Achievements’ in their respective fields.
title: TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: I am delighted that TKRES has published the College Souvenir-2011. The Editorial Board has done a fair job to put up facts before students and parent community. To express one’s thought, College Magazine is the best platform and this is what our students have expressed in terms of contributions towards the magazine. I congratulate Editorial Board for unleashing the hidden potential of the students and making this Magazine a chapter of TKRES history.
title: TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: TKRCET stands out as a premier institution committed to academic excellence, innovation, and holistic development. With state-of-the-art infrastructure, industry-aligned curriculum, and a strong focus on research and skill enhancement, the college ensures students are well-prepared for real-world challenges. Our exceptional placement record, dedicated faculty, and student-centric approach create an environment where talent thrives and futures are built. Join TKRCET to unlock your potential and step confidently into a successful career
title: TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: The alumni of TKRCET, established in 2008 and registered under ID 322/2008, have quickly proven themselves to be capable engineers, scientists, and professionals. Their achievements have helped establish a positive image for their alma mater as a distinguished educational institution. Upon graduating from TKRCET, students embark on their professional journeys, where higher education plays a crucial role in their career development. Our alumni have consistently demonstrated excellence from the outset, maintaining personal connections with one another that go beyond the formal channels of the Alumni Association. For TKRCET, a special bond is formed when students complete their studies and move forward into their careers. Witnessing our graduates excel and make significant contributions in their fields fills us with immense pride and joy—an indescribable feeling that reflects the strength and spirit of our institution.

text: The Institution is committed and dedicated to mould the students into quality engineers and technologists with aplomb by providing world-class scientific and technical education through:
title: Vision& Mission – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Ensuring excellent branch wise infrastructural facilities with eminent and qualified faculty
title: Vision& Mission – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Making the institute a research/resource centre to enhance scope for consultancy and R&D
title: Vision& Mission – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Our mission is to cultivate a dynamic learning environment that transforms students into capable engineers and responsible citizens. To achieve this, we are committed to:
title: Vision& Mission – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Providing World-Class Technical Education:Delivering comprehensive programs across all disciplines through a curriculum that is aligned with industry needs and emerging technologies.
title: Vision& Mission – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Ensuring State-of-the-Art Infrastructure:Maintaining modern laboratories, libraries, and computing facilities to support both teaching and research activities in every department.
title: Vision& Mission – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Employing Eminent and Qualified Faculty:Engaging experienced educators and researchers to mentor students and promote academic excellence.
title: Vision& Mission – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Promoting Ethical and Professional Values:Instilling a strong sense of ethics, discipline, and responsibility among students to prepare them for societal and professional roles.
title: Vision& Mission – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Encouraging Innovation and Research:Fostering a research-centric atmosphere that encourages students and faculty to undertake projects with practical and social relevance.
title: Vision& Mission – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Establishing Industry Partnerships:Collaborating with leading industries to enhance learning through internships, guest lectures, and joint research opportunities.
title: Vision& Mission – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Becoming a Hub for R&D and Consultancy:Positioning the institute as a recognized resource center for advanced research, development, and consultancy services.
title: Vision& Mission – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Supporting Holistic Student Development:Offering extracurricular and co-curricular activities to shape well-rounded individuals with leadership and communication skills.
title: Vision& Mission – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

title: Vision& Mission – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: TKR College of Engineering and Technology – a modern temple of learning, an off shoot of the TKR Educational Society was established in the year 2002 in a sprawling, lush green 20 acre campus at Meerpet, Hyderabad. The college provides a serene and tranquil environment to the students, boosting their mental potential and preparing them in all aspects to face the cut- throat global competition with a smile on the face and emerge victorious.
title: About the Campus – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Sri Teegala Krishna Reddy, the Mayor of Hyderabad, is the founder chairman of TKR Educational Society. A Philanthropist by nature, “the friend of man, to vice alone of foe”, and an urge to see our students excelling themselves in all fields prompted him to start the educational society; making it easy for education to be within arm’s length of even a rural student and providing them with an independent and easy in the for pursuing their dreams and making them come true and in the process upholding moral and ethical values.
title: About the Campus – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: The person puts in all his efforts to see the students excelling themselves and takes great pride in watching them carve out a niche for themselves is none other than Dr.T.Harinath Reddy, the Secretary of the college. A calm and serene countenance with sharp, twinkling eyes, he is the pivotal of encouragement and is always on the look out for avenues, which would provide the wherewithal for developing a cutting edge to their capabilities and potentialities.
title: About the Campus – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: The college is headed by eminent principal Dr. D. V. Ravi Shankar. He obtained his AMIE in Mechanical Engineering, M.Tech and Ph.D from JNT University, Hyderabad. He published various research papers in national and international journals.
title: About the Campus – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: The College is affiliated to Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University Kukatpally, Hyderabd. It has been approved by AICTE, New Delhi and the State Government of Telangana and has been sanctioned seven UG courses – Civil Engineering, Electrical & Electronics Engineering, Computer Science & Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering, Mechanical Engineering and PG Courses – M.Tech in CSE, PE & MBA. In addition the College is running second shift Polytechnic in the branches – CIVIL, EEE, MECH, ECE & CSE.
title: About the Campus – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

title: Chairman’s Message – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: TKR Educational Society was established in 2001, it is reputedly academic oriented. Sri. Teegala Krishna Reddy, the former mayor of Hyderabad and leader of masses is the Chairman of the society. A native of Meerpet Village with challenging experiences in the process of emerged into a reputed educationalist with a laudable ambition of spreading education to meet the educational needs of the aspirant youth. Under his dynamic and creative chairmanship, the TKR Educational institutions for the prospective future of aspiring youth for the purpose of serving A.P State in particular and our country in general.
title: Chairman’s Message – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: These premier educational institutions are TKR College of Engineering and Technology established in 2002, Teegala Krishna Reddy College of Engineering established in 2005, TKR Institute of Management and Science established in 2003, and TKR College of Pharmacy established in 2007, in a speawling area of 30 acres. TKRCET and TKREC are affiliated to JNTU and approved by AICTE. TKRCOP is affiliated to JNTU and approved by AICTE. TKRCOP is affiliated to JNTU and approved by PCI. TKRIMS is affiliated to OU and approved by AICTE. These institutions impart the latest knowledge in Technology, Management and Pharmacy to create global leaders. With boundless and boundary-less creativity and a highly committed, the TKR Educational Society has been consistently shaping intellects capable of integrating the contemporary knowledge with classic values through its institutions, since the philosophy of TKRES is to achieve excellence both in academic and non-academic areas with an incessant pursuit of accomplishing milestones.
title: Chairman’s Message – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: TKR College of Engineering and Technology – a modern temple of learning, an off shoot of the TKR Educational Society was established in the year 2002 in a sprawling, lush green 20 acre campus at Meerpet, Hyderabad. The college provides a serene and tranquil environment to the students, boosting their mental potential and preparing them in all aspects to face the cut- throat global competition with a smile on the face and emerge victorious.
title: Chairman’s Message – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Dr. T. Harinath Reddy, a Physician, is the Honorable Secretary of the TKR Educational Society and Mr. T. Amarnath Reddy, a Management graduate is the Honorable Treasurer of the Society, who are endowed with administrative and managerial skills.
title: Chairman’s Message – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

title: Secretary’s Message – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Engineers play the most vital and important role in nation building. They create new inventions using best engineered technologies to make human life more comfortable, secure and productive. In modern times, nations which have rich engineering and experienced management domains are flourishing economically and are providing better lives to their people We have excellent potential to grow in diversified areas and excel in Engineering and Management fields. We need enormous number of engineers and managers to write next story of success.
title: Secretary’s Message – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: The essence of Engineering and Management education which has spread in India is a very positive sign not only to cater domestic needs but provide manpower to the entire world and become biggest technically trained community. TEEGALA KRISHNA REDDY EDUCATIONAL SOCIETY is a venture contributing to this Endeavour. We have started with full force to play a leading role in providing quality education and careers. We have identified the needs of modern engineering, technology and management education for modern age students, with a vision and mission accompanying transparency, accountability and accessibility which keeps us abreast and also ahead of our competitors.
title: Secretary’s Message – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: At the outset I send my greetings to the Editorial Board of TKRES Souvenir 2011, for working on a Magazine best in all aspects. We want to provide a complete package of educational services to TKRES students. I believe this magazine will provide us the benchmark for continued improvement in overall development of the College. This magazine should be a good source of guidance for faculty and coming batches of students in choosing activities of their choice in their future for building their careers. I appreciate the efforts of the Editorial team who have done an excellent job in compiling TKRES activities over the year and disseminate them through this Magazine as well as on the TKRES website.
title: Secretary’s Message – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

title: Treasurer’s Message – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: The motive of TKRES is to develop a global perspective to cope -up with the fast changing technology scenario. In addition to this, values with discipline are the hallmark of our college, besides, ensuring quality of the students; here the emphasis is not only on academic excellence but the development of the overall total personality of a student. To achieve this goal, add on courses, training in personality development, and other soft skills are also provided in our College.
title: Treasurer’s Message – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: We take special care to ensure that new ideas are not merely discussed here but executed. Execution of new ideas helps the faculty and students to tread the path of ‘Innovation’ which is the slogan of our Institution. As excellence is the only criterion for selection of students, we are confident that in due course, promises will become ‘Achievements’ in their respective fields.
title: Treasurer’s Message – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: I am delighted that TKRES has published the College Souvenir-2011. The Editorial Board has done a fair job to put up facts before students and parent community. To express one’s thought, College Magazine is the best platform and this is what our students have expressed in terms of contributions towards the magazine. I congratulate Editorial Board for unleashing the hidden potential of the students and making this Magazine a chapter of TKRES history.
title: Treasurer’s Message – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

title: Principal – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: TKR Educational Society was established in 2001, it is reputedly academic oriented. Sri. Teegala Krishna Reddy, the former Mayor of Hyderabad, Ex-MLA Maheshwaram and leader of masses is the Chairman of the society. A native of Meerpet Village with challenging experiences in the process of emerged…
title: Principal – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Dr. D. V. Ravi Shankar, Principal, TKR College of Engineering & Technology had obtained his AMIE from Institution of Engineers in the year 1987. He completed his M.Tech in Materials Engineering from Regional Engineering College (REC) presently NIT, Suratkal in the year 1994. He presented his M.Tech thesis paper at ISRO, Bangalore. He obtained is Ph.D in the branch of Mechanical Engineering in the year 2010 from JNT University, Hyderabad under the guidance of Dr. P. Rami Reddy, former Registrar, JNTUH.
title: Principal – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: He has totally 23 years of experience which includes 7 years of Industrial experience and 16 years academic experience. Under his able guidance 35 Projects had completed in UG level, 10 Projects in PG Level and presently guiding 8 Projects in Ph.D Level.
title: Principal – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: He has won gold medals for three successive years at 35th, 36th and 39th All India Level Design Competitions organized by National Design and Research Forum, The Institution of Engineers (India).
title: Principal – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

title: Vice Principal – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Dr. A. Suresh Rao, is a Professor in the Department of Computer Science & Engineering and was conferred with the PhD Degree in Computer Science & Engineering from NIT Warangal, in the year 2015. He is currently the Vice Principal, Dean of Academics and Head of the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at TKRCET.
title: Vice Principal – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: His experience spans across a period of 20 years; 02 years in the Industry and 18 Years in Teaching.
title: Vice Principal – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Apart from teaching he is also a discerning administrator. Under his guidance more than 40 students have undergone project training at UG level and 20 students at PG level. Two batches of students have won 3rd prize in Smart India Hackathon 2017. He has 15 International and National Publications to his credit.
title: Vice Principal – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: He provides consultancy for various Government Bodies and Private firms in developing the required software for their automation, and also holds one patent in publishing state.
title: Vice Principal – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

title: Admission Procedure – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: The Eligibility Criteria for Admission to B.Tech Programme:
title: Admission Procedure – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Admissions to the Institute are made along with the other Engineering colleges in the state through a common entrance test (EAMCET) conducted by the Govt. of Telangana State.
title: Admission Procedure – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: The admission pattern to B. Tech is as follows: The minimum qualification for admission to first year of the B. Tech course is a pass in the Intermediate (10 + 2) conducted by the board of Intermediate education, Govt. of Telangana State or any other examination recognized as equivalent thereto with Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry as optional subjects.
title: Admission Procedure – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: ADMISSION1. 70 % of the seats are allotted based on the merit in the EAMCET.2. 30 % of the seats are earmarked for Management/NRI candidates.3. In addition to the above, Diploma holders are admitted in second year of B. Tech to the extent of 10% of intake based on the merit in the ECET, under lateral entry scheme.
title: Admission Procedure – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: The Eligibility Criteria for Admission to M.Tech Programme :
title: Admission Procedure – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Non Sponsored Candidates must have a B.E / B.Tech Degree or its equivalent from AICTE approved Institutions and a valid GATE score/ PGECET Rank. Sponsored Candidates must have a minimum B.E / B.Tech Degree or its equivalent from AICTE approved Institutions with a minimum of 55% marks in aggregate.The candidate must have a minimum two years of full time work experience in a recognized firm / industry / Company / Educational or Research Institution / Any Department of Government / Autonomous organization in the relevant field in which admission is being sought. A letter from the employer must be furnished stating that the candidate is being sponsored to get admission. The employer should also indicate that the candidate will not be withdrawn, midway till the completion of the programme
title: Admission Procedure – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Admission will be made through GATE, by the convenor PGECET. When GATE Candidates are not available, admission will be given to PGECET qualified candidates on merit basis. Admission for Sponsored category will be made based on merit. Preference will be given to GATE qualified candidates.
title: Admission Procedure – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: TKR Educational Society was established in 2001, it is reputedly academic oriented. Sri. Teegala Krishna Reddy, the former Mayor of Hyderabad, Ex-MLA Maheshwaram and leader of masses is the Chairman of the society. A native of Meerpet Village with challenging experiences in the process of emerged…
title: Dean Academics – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Dr. A. Suresh Rao, is a Professor in the Department of Computer Science & Engineering and was conferred with the PhD Degree in Computer Science & Engineering from NIT Warangal, in the year 2015. He is currently the Vice Principal, Dean of Academics and Head of the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at TKRCET.
title: Dean Academics – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: His experience spans across a period of 20 years; 02 years in the Industry and 18 Years in Teaching.
title: Dean Academics – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Apart from teaching he is also a discerning administrator. Under his guidance more than 40 students have undergone project training at UG level and 20 students at PG level. Two batches of students have won 3rd prize in Smart India Hackathon 2017. He has 15 International and National Publications to his credit.
title: Dean Academics – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: He provides consultancy for various Government Bodies and Private firms in developing the required software for their automation, and also holds one patent in publishing state.
title: Dean Academics – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Head of the Department,Department of Civil Engineering
title: Civil Engineering – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: This Civil Department was started in 2009 with basic equipment for Undergraduate Course. From start, Civil Engineering Laboratories has been modified and updated several times to changing syllabus and technology. In addition to classrooms and laboratories, we have independent computer lab to train the students and faculty to learn new softwares of future needs.
title: Civil Engineering – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Civil Engineering is considered the most versatile and oldest among all engineering branches. It is the branch with a lot of diversity. The Department’s vision is to give an exposure to budding civil technocrats to various challenges in the profession having a highly qualified and experienced faculty with excellent academic record. There is a combination of academic excellence and industrial experience amongst the faculty, which is instrumental in imparting the right blend of theoretical and practical knowledge to the students.
title: Civil Engineering – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Subjects taught include Surveying, Concrete Technology, Geotechnical Engineering, Structural Engineering, Hydraulics, Hydrology & Water Resources Engineering, Transportation Engineering, Geographic Information System, Environmental Engineering, and Construction Project Planning Management. In addition, activities like seminars, projects, assignments, quizzes and other such competitions are conducted on regular basis to induce the professional skills in the students, which ultimately help them in getting placed in reputed organizations.
title: Civil Engineering – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: To become a place of learning for imparting technical education of international standards and for conducting research on cutting edge technologies to meet the Global Challenges.
title: Civil Engineering – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Prepare globally competent and successful civil engineers.
title: Civil Engineering – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Provide in-depth knowledge and skills in the technical areas pertaining to civil engineering.
title: Civil Engineering – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Engineering Knowledge: Apply the knowledge of mathematics, science, engineering fundamentals, and an engineering specialization to the solution of complex engineering problems.
title: Civil Engineering – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Problem Analysis: Identify, formulate, review research literature, and analyse complex engineering problems reaching substantiated conclusions using first principles of mathematics, natural sciences, and engineering sciences.
title: Civil Engineering – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Design/Development of Solutions: Design solutions for complex engineering problems and design system components or processes that meet the specified needs with appropriate consideration for the public health and safety, and the cultural, societal, and environmental considerations.
title: Civil Engineering – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Conduct Investigations of Complex Problems: Use research-based knowledge and research methods including design of experiments, analysis and interpretation of data, and synthesis of the information to provide valid conclusions.
title: Civil Engineering – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Modern Tool Usage: Create, select, and apply appropriate techniques, resources, and modern engineering and IT tools including prediction and modelling to complex engineering activities with an understanding of the limitations.
title: Civil Engineering – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: The Engineer and Society: Apply reasoning informed by the contextual knowledge to assess societal, health, safety, legal and cultural issues and the consequent responsibilities relevant to the professional engineering practice.
title: Civil Engineering – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Environment and Sustain ability: Understand the impact of the professional engineering solutions in societal and environmental contexts, and demonstrate the knowledge of, and need for sustainable development.
title: Civil Engineering – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Ethics: Apply ethical principles and commit to professional ethics and responsibilities and norms of the engineering practice.
title: Civil Engineering – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Individual and Team Work: Function effectively as an individual, and as a member or leader in diverse teams, and in multi-disciplinary settings.
title: Civil Engineering – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Communication: Communicate effectively on complex engineering activities with the engineering community and with society at large, such as, being able to comprehend and write effective reports and design documentation, make effective presentations, and give and receive clear instructions.
title: Civil Engineering – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Project Management and Finance: Demonstrate knowledge and understanding of the engineering and management principles and apply these to one’s own work, as a member and leader in a team, to manage projects and in multi-disciplinary environments.
title: Civil Engineering – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Life-long Learning: Recognize the need for, and have the preparation and ability to engage in independent and life-long learning in the broadest context of technological change.
title: Civil Engineering – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: The current Civil Engineering educational objectives were developed as part of the program’s ongoing efforts to maintain through innovation an program that meet the needs of our constituents. The educational objectives of the Civil Engineering program are :
title: Civil Engineering – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: PEO 1 : To provide students with a sound foundation in mathematical and scientific subjects, which are necessary prerequisites for a clear and sound understanding of Civil Engineering as a whole and to encourage those students who are motivated to go for post graduate programs on the branch of their interest. Those wishing to enter services through competitive examination should also be encouraged.
title: Civil Engineering – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: PEO 2 : To provide the students with a comprehensive and balanced understanding of the several branches of civil engineering such as structural engineering , Geo technical engineering, Transportation engineering, Hydraulic and water resources engineering, Environmental engineering and engineering breadth to create novel products and solutions for the real life problems.
title: Civil Engineering – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: PEO 3 : To prepare graduates in Civil Engineering for successful careers dealing with analysis, design and management of infrastructural projects. It must also help them to develop an intelligent understanding of the theoretical bases of various coder provisions in design, construction and maintenance
title: Civil Engineering – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: PEO 4 : To create an understanding among the student body the values of lifelong learning and to inculcate in them professional ethics, moral values and social concern.
title: Civil Engineering – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: PEO 5 : To provide opportunities to students to work in interdisciplinary project across the various branches of Civil Engineering.
title: Civil Engineering – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: The Department of Electrical Engineering, established in 2002, initially offered a B. Tech program in Electrical & Electronics Engineering. To diversify and provide industry-oriented training at the postgraduate level, the department introduced M. Tech courses in Power Electronics in 2010. Currently, research efforts are focused on various areas within Electrical Engineering, such as Power Systems, Power Electronics and Drives, Power Converters, High Voltage Engineering, Control Systems, Artificial Intelligence Techniques, Renewable Energy Resources, Electric Vehicles, and software tools like ETAP, MATLAB, Ansys, and Python.The department has a dedicated team of twenty regular faculty members who are highly experienced and actively engaged in research. It is also well-equipped with state-of-the-art facilities and supported by qualified technical staff. Additionally, the department’s undergraduate programme is accredited by the NBA, tier-II up to 2022.

Tech. in Electrical power Engineering from JNTU University, College of Engineering Hyderabad, in 2011 and Ph.D. in Electrical Engineering from Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Hyderabad, India in 2018. D Guideship from JNTUH R&D, Hyderabad.

text: Dr. M. Mahesh is a Professor and HOD in the Department of ECE, a distinguished academician with 22years of teaching experience. He pursued Masters from JNTU Hyderabad and Ph.D in the area of Image processing from JNTUA, Anantapur.
title: Electronics & Communication Engineering – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: The Department of ECE was established in 2002 with an intake of 60 B.Tech students. Department has expanded steadily over the last few years, the department presently offers B. Tech.
title: Electronics & Communication Engineering – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: The Electronics and Communication Engineering has been one of the key departments of the institute . Department of ECE comprises competent faculty members and with rich teaching, grooms the students to step into a bright career spanning across Hardware and Software Engineering with excellent laboratory facilities and highly qualified dedicated faculty, The department faculty is actively engaged in academic and research up gradations .The department has well experienced faculties, almost all faculties are enriched with NPTEL certifications among which 8 faculties has received Gold Medal certification they also have their publications in various SCI, Scopus and UGC indexed journals.
title: Electronics & Communication Engineering – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: ECE Department has to its credit got approval of start-up research grant from SERB,DST an amount of Rs 13,46.400 to our professor Dr Girish Kumar.
title: Electronics & Communication Engineering – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: The field of electronics and communication engineering has major contributions to the society which we are enjoying and witnessing today. The people across the world are able to connect in instantly because of fast growth in this field. This importance makes the Electronics and Communication Engineering branch to stay ever green on top of all other Engineering branches as well. A significant step taken by the government is establishing a semiconductor wafer fab manufacturing facility that drags employment in the areas of VLSI design. This course of engineering covers the major fields of electronics like Digital Signal Processing, Embedded Systems, VLSI Technology Design, microprocessor and Micro controllers, Microwave Engineering, RADARs, Digital Communication, Satellite Communication, and Mobile Communication apart from basic subjects.
title: Electronics & Communication Engineering – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: The Department endeavors to transform itself into a center of academic excellence in the field of Electronics & Communication Engineering thereby producing technically competent, confident, socially and ethically responsible engineers.

text: From NIT-WarangalProfessor & Head of the Department
title: Computer Science and Engineering – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: The Department of Computer Science and Engineering (CSE) was established in 2002 with the goal of delivering integrated technology education to students from all across India and the world, thereby developing responsible citizens who would contribute to the advancement of their families, community, and nation. Under the dynamic guidance of Dr. A. Suresh Rao, the department is experiencing a moment of tremendous development and potential driven by the advancement of technology and its recognition.
title: Computer Science and Engineering – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Dr. A. Suresh Rao, is a Professor in the Department of Computer Science & Engineering and was conferred with the PhD Degree in Computer Science & Engineering from NIT Warangal, in the year 2014. He is currently the Vice Principal, Dean of Academics and Head of the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at TKRCET. His experience spans across a period of 22 years; 02 years in the Industry and 20 Years in Teaching. Apart from teaching he is also a discerning administrator. Under his guidance more than 40 students have undergone project training at UG level and 20 students at PG level. Two batches of students have won 3rd prize in Smart India Hackathon Contest. He has 22 International and National Publications to his credit. He provides consultancy for various Government Bodies and Private firms in developing the required software for their automation, and also holds a patent in granted.
title: Computer Science and Engineering – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: The department aims to mould the students into ethically responsible professionals having computational thinking, entrepreneurial traits and technical knowledge to conceive, design and deploy reliable computing systems for modern industry and to offer self-reliant services in research, academic arenas of science, society and technology.
title: Computer Science and Engineering – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

title: Computer Science and Engineering – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Upon completion of 4 year under graduate program, the student will be able to possess the following outcomes…..
title: Computer Science and Engineering – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: PO1: Engineering Knowledge: Apply the knowledge of mathematics, science, engineering fundamentals, and an engineering specialization to the solution of complex engineering problems.PO2: Problem Analysis: Identify, formulate, review research literature, and analyse complex engineering problems reaching substantiated conclusions using first principles of mathematics, natural sciences, and engineering sciences.PO3: Design/Development of solutions: Design solutions for complex engineering problems and design system components or processes that meet the specified needs with appropriate consideration for the public health and safety, and the cultural, societal, and environment considerations.PO4: Conduct investigations of Complex Problems: Use research-based knowledge and research methods including design of experiments analysis and interpretation of data, and synthesis of the information to provide valid conclusions for complex problems.PO5: Modern Tool Usage: create, select, and apply appropriate techniques, resources, and modern engineering and IT tools including prediction and modelling to complex engineering activities with an understanding of the limitations.PO6: The Engineer and Society: Apply reasoning informed by the contextual knowledge to assess societal, health, safety, legal and cultural issues and the consequent responsibilities relevant to the professional engineering practice.PO7: Environment and sustainability: Understand the impact of the professional engineering solutions in societal and environmental contexts, demonstrate the knowledge of, and need for sustainable development.PO8: Ethics: Apply ethical principles and commit to professional ethics, responsibilities and norms of the engineering practice.PO9: Individual Teamwork: Function effectively as an individual, and as a member or leader in diverse teams, and in multi-disciplinary settings.PO10: Communication: Communicate effectively on complex engineering activities with the engineering community and with society, such as, being able to comprehend and write effective reports and design documentation, make effective presentations, and give and receive clear instructions.PO11: Project Management and Finance: Demonstrate knowledge and understanding of the engineering and management principles and apply these to one’s own work, as a member and leader in a team, to manage projects and in multi-disciplinary environments.PO12: Life-long Learning: Recognize the need for, and have the preparation and ability to engage in independent and life-long learning in the broadest context of technological change.
title: Computer Science and Engineering – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: PSO1: Developing software applications with key focus on privacy, cost and utility.PSO2: Storing, processing, analysing, communicating the data for effective decision-making while finding solutions for problems.
title: Computer Science and Engineering – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: PEO1-Preparation: Develop professional skills for a successful professional career as an engineer, scientist, technocrat, administrator or an entrepreneur.PEO2-Core Competence: Design and implement practical systems consisting of software and/or hardware components through the key principles and practices of computation, mathematics and basic principles of engineering.PEO3-Multidisciplinary: Design and apply new ideas and technologies as the field evolves, to solve real world problems in related interdisciplinary areas.PEO4-Professional Environment: Demonstrate professional attitude and ethics, effective communication, team work and managerial skills for societal, environmental and global context.

text: On completion of the programme after four years of study, the student will be able to achieve the following specific outcomes in the field of Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine learning).
title: CSE-AIML(CSM) – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: PSO 1: To be able to design and develop Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning algorithms and intelligent systems.
title: CSE-AIML(CSM) – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: PSO 2: Storing, processing, analyzing and learning from data for effective decision-making while finding possible optimal solutions to problems.

text: Preparation: Develop professional skills for a successful professional career as an engineer, scientist, technocrat, administrator or an entrepreneur.

text: Design Proficiency: The graduates will be able to design and develop solutions for real life problems using modern engineering tools.
title: CSE-AIML(CSM) – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Multidisciplinary: Design and apply new ideas and technologies as the field evolves, to solve real world problems in related interdisciplinary areas.
title: CSE-AIML(CSM) – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Professional Practice: The graduates will leverage their quality education, coupled with a profound grasp of ethical principles, collaborate within teams, communicate proficiently and exercise strong managerial skills in their professional endeavours.

text: Students in a Data Science Engineering program typically start with a strong foundation in computer programming languages like Python, R, or Java, which are essential for data manipulation and analysis. They also study statistical concepts and methods, such as probability theory, regression analysis, and machine learning algorithms.

title: Information Technology – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: The Department of Information Technology was established in the year2006 and offered B. Tech program with an intake of 60 students. From 2022onwards the intake was increased to 120 seats. The department is running with highly qualified faculty members as per the guidelines of JNTUH and AICTE, New Delhi. It has self-sufficient sophisticated infrastructural state-of-art Laboratories. The Department is accredited by NBA in the Academic year 2021-22.The Department is taking care in the academic exposure of the students to the latest domain trends by conducting a series of seminars, conferences, guest lectures, faculty development programs etc…,
title: Information Technology – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: The Department of Information Technology strives to impart quality technical education, ethical and moral values to meet the needs of the industry and society. [ With effect from Academic Year: 2022-23]
title: Information Technology – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: To develop dynamic IT professional by providing quality education.
title: Information Technology – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: To facilitate the students to work with modern tools and technologies.
title: Information Technology – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: To mould the students by inculcating the sprit of moral and ethical values contribution tothe society. [With effect from Academic Year: 2022-23]
title: Information Technology – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: WK1: A systematic, theory-based understanding of the natural sciences applicable to thediscipline and awareness of relevant social sciences.
title: Information Technology – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: WK2: Conceptually-based mathematics, numerical analysis, data analysis, statistics andformal aspects of computer and information science to support detailed analysis andmodelling applicable to the discipline.
title: Information Technology – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: WK3: A systematic, theory-based formulation of engineering fundamentals required in theengineering discipline.
title: Information Technology – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: WK4: Engineering specialist knowledge that provides theoretical frameworks and bodies ofknowledge for the accepted practice areas in the engineering discipline; much is at theforefront of the discipline.
title: Information Technology – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: WK5: Knowledge, including efficient resource use, environmental impacts, whole-life cost,re-use of resources, net zero carbon, and similar concepts, that supports engineeringdesign and operations in a practice area.
title: Information Technology – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: WK6: Knowledge of engineering practice (technology) in the practice areas in the engineeringdiscipline.
title: Information Technology – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: WK7: Knowledge of the role of engineering in society and identified issues in engineeringpractice in the discipline, such as the professional responsibility of an engineer to publicsafety and sustainable development.
title: Information Technology – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: WK8: Engagement with selected knowledge in the current research literature of the discipline,awareness of the power of critical thinking and creative approaches to evaluateemerging issues.
title: Information Technology – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: WK9: Ethics, inclusive behavior and conduct. Knowledge of professional ethics,responsibilities, and norms of engineering practice. Awareness of the need for diversityby reason of ethnicity, gender, age, physical ability etc. with mutual understandingand respect, and of inclusive attitudes. [With effect from Academic Year: 2024-25]
title: Information Technology – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Upon completion of 4 year under graduate program, the student will be able to possess the followingoutcomes
title: Information Technology – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: PO1: Engineering Knowledge: Apply knowledge of mathematics, natural science,computing, engineering fundamentals and an engineering specialization as specifiedin WK1 to WK4 respectively to develop to the solution of complex engineeringproblems.
title: Information Technology – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: PO2: Problem Analysis: Identify, formulate, review research literature and analyzecomplex engineering problems reaching substantiated conclusions with considerationfor sustainable development. (WK1 to WK4)
title: Information Technology – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: PO3: Design/Development of Solutions: Design creative solutions for complexengineering problems and design/develop systems/components/processes to meetidentified needs with consideration for the public health and safety, whole-life cost,net zero carbon, culture, society and environment as required. (WK5)
title: Information Technology – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: PO4: Conduct Investigations of Complex Problems: Conduct investigations of complexengineering problems using research-based knowledge including design ofexperiments, modelling, analysis & interpretation of data to provide valid conclusions.(WK8)
title: Information Technology – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: PO5: Engineering Tool Usage: Create, select and apply appropriate techniques, resourcesand modern engineering & IT tools, including prediction and modelling recognizingtheir limitations to solve complex engineering problems. (WK2 and WK6)
title: Information Technology – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: PO6: The Engineer and The World: Analyze and evaluate societal and environmentalaspects while solving complex engineering problems for its impact on sustainabilitywith reference to economy, health, safety, legal framework, culture and environment.(WK1, WK5, and WK7)
title: Information Technology – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: PO7: Ethics: Apply ethical principles and commit to professional ethics, human values,diversity and inclusion; adhere to national & international laws. (WK9)
title: Information Technology – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: PO8: Individual and Collaborative Team work: Function effectively as an individual, andas a member or leader in diverse/multi-disciplinary teams.
title: Information Technology – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: PO9: Communication: Communicate effectively and inclusively within the engineeringcommunity and society at large, such as being able to comprehend and write effectivereports and design documentation, make effective presentations considering cultural,language, and learning differences
title: Information Technology – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: PO10: Project Management and Finance: Apply knowledge and understanding ofengineering management principles and economic decision-making and apply these toone’s own work, as a member and leader in a team, and to manage projects and inmultidisciplinary environments.
title: Information Technology – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: PO11: Life-Long Learning: Recognize the need for, and have the preparation and ability fori) independent and life-long learning ii) adaptability to new and emerging technologiesand iii) critical thinking in the broadest context of technological change. (WK8).[With effect from Academic Year: 2024-25]
title: Information Technology – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: PSO1: Analyze,design and implement IT enabled solutions to meet the industry needs using appropriate tools & techniques.PSO2: Storing, processing, analyzing and learning from data for effective decision-making while finding solutions for problems.
title: Information Technology – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: PSO1: Analyze,design and implement IT enabled solutions to meet the industry needs using appropriate tools & techniques.
title: Information Technology – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: PSO2: Storing, processing, analyzing and learning from data for effective decision-making while finding solutions for problems.
title: Information Technology – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: The Educational Objectives of the programme offered by the department are listed below:
title: Information Technology – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: PEO-1: The graduates will be able to design and implement IT based solutions for real lifeproblems using modern engineering tools.
title: Information Technology – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: PEO-2: The graduates will have the ability to analyze and interpret experimental results in frontier areas of Information Technology and an inclination for higher learning in multidisciplinary areas.
title: Information Technology – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: PEO-3: The graduates will be able to communicate and work in a team effectively for professional development.
title: Information Technology – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: PEO-4: The graduates will engage in lifelong learning while sustaining ethical and human values [With effect from Academic Year: 2022-23]

text: Management Is an Art of Securing Maximum prosperity with a minimum of effort so as to secure Maximum prosperity and happiness for both the employer and employee and Give the Public the best possible service
title: MBA – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: The Two years Program of Master of Business Administration was established at TKRCET with primary objective of Developing Eminent Young Managers. MBA program is broadly designed to develop various competencies in the students in a healthy environment that motivates them. The Program Has Special emphasis on Technology Management and to meet the emerging challenges of Current Technology driven management. The Dept has Excellent Team of Experienced & Qualified Faculty. The Department has well established infrastructure and resources in the form of Library, Digital Library and References which always proved very much useful for the students.

text: The Department of Sciences and Humanities was established in 2002.It offers different foundational courses in across various disciplines like Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, English Language, Communication Skills and Management for the first year students of B. Tech Programme.
title: Humanities-Sciences – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: The department offers quality education in teaching, learning and evaluation processes. It is supported with state-of-the art infrastructure and learning resources. The technologically-advanced laboratories and workshops, student-centric teaching methods, and blended learning platforms help students carry out their academic pursuit with ease.
title: Humanities-Sciences – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Research activities like workshops, seminars, publications, invited lectures etc are carried out by the department regularly for the benefit of both the students and faculty members.
title: Humanities-Sciences – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: The department also provides a variety of co-curricular and extra-curricular platforms to the students with the aim of moulding them into better human beings. Various cultural activities and competitions are organised regularly by the department with the support of the management. The students are motivated to participate in programmes organised by the department in order to face and tackle real life situations and problems of the society.
title: Humanities-Sciences – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Dr. D.V.S.R. Anil Kumar is a Professor and Head of the Department of Humanities and Sciences at TKRCET.
title: Humanities-Sciences – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: He completed his Doctoral degree in Lattice Measures from Nagarjuna University in the year 2012. He has an extensive teaching experience of over 21 years in the areas of Algebra, Real Analysis, Complex Analysis, Topology, Measure Theory, Number Theory etc. Apart from teaching he has worked as BOS Chairman to frame the Mathematics syllabus for R-17, R-18 and R-20 regulations. He has been working as a subject expert as well as a reviewer, item creator for TCSION from 2020 onwards. He is also a subject expert item creator for AICTE. He has over 40 national and international publications to his credit and has chaired sessions in international conferences. He has been elected as a life member by the Council of the Andhra Pradesh Society for Mathematical Sciences and is a senior member of the International Association of Computer Science and Information Technology. As the Head of the Department, he has been creating an efficient interface for the First-year engineering students to move on to higher technical platforms in their second, third and final year B.Tech. courses.
title: Humanities-Sciences – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: TKR College of Engineering & Technology, Library & Information Centre Central Library is the temple of learning; as such it is given top priority and centrally located. Library is the gateway of knowledge and culture. It has been established since inception of the College in the Year 2002.Located in the Central Block 2nd and 3rd Floor with Duplex model four sections. The library carpet area of more than 1740(sqm).The library is well equipped with modern facilities fully Automated with barcode technology. The Library at TKRCET is Integrated Knowledge Centre that is stock of 95,250 volumes(books), 12,086 Titles in all the disciplines of Polytechnic, B.Tech, M.Tech and MBA, Academic Studies and Research materials and articles spanning over the Last 22 years in addition the Library subscribed Print National, International Journals direct from publishers apart from, Online Journals EBSCO-IEEE, INFLIBNET N-List, DELNET, Technical Magazines and News Papers are also available.

text: The Entrepreneurship Development Cell (EDC) was established at TKR College of Engineering and Technology (TKRCET) on 12th December 2007 with an aim to develop entrepreneurial skills in budding professionals. The institute provides the required technical support and infrastructure to students with innovative ideas to transform the ideas to new products and services. The EDC mentors, pools the required sponsors (National entrepreneurship training agencies) willing to aid budding entrepreneurs. Aspiring engineering students are provided necessary inputs to become successful entrepreneurs through workshops and seminars conducted by eminent people from the industry. At TKRCET, we encourage students to consider self-employment as a career option, providing necessary training in entrepreneurship skills through standardized courses. The cell also organizes different activities and events from time to time to train and motivate the students in entrepreneurship.
title: Research – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: The TKR Centre for Research and Innovation at the TKR College of Engineering and Technology intends to persuade students to be pragmatic by helping them to transform basic scientific, technological, and abstract ideas into practical reality. The TKR Centre for Research & Innovation with a 21000sft carpet area will provide an ecosystem for the students to learn by doing and will support them in thinking critically, being innovative, visualizing products, and developing and implementing prototypes. The Lab will serve as a cross-disciplinary and multiple stakeholders’ platform to enable student entrepreneurship, collaboration with the industry, and commercialization.
title: Research – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: Professor and Dean of R&D, has been working at TKR College of Engineering and Technology since Jan 2012. He has been awarded Junior Research Fellowship when he was in doctoral studies and finished his Ph.D. in Physics from Osmania University in 2005.
title: Research – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: He has been appointed as Research Associate as well as Visiting Associate for S.N. Bose National Center for Basic Sciences during 2007-20012 and 2013-2016 respectively. He rejoined this college in the year 2012 as an Associate Professor, during that period, he acted as the Coordinator for the Digital Classes also. Acted as a Principal Investigator DST project entitled “Determination of Magnetic field induced Strain in CoNiAl FSMAs for Sensors and Actuators”, during 2013-2016 worth Rs. 17.04L. In the year 2016, he presented a paper orally at Kyto JAPAN for which he got full funding(1.5 L) from UGC, New Delhi. Recently one of his paper was accepted for presentation at an International Conference to be held in the USA(TEXAS A&M University) during May 2023. He has 32 Journal publications, 26 paper presentations(oral) at symposia, was invited for lectures in the colleges and universities in different seminars and workshops, presented 20 poster presentations, organized few conferences, and attended national and international conferences.
title: Research – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology

text: He is guiding a few research scholars for their Ph.D work. Also acted as a reviewer for the Journal of Materials today. Recently JNTUH accorded PhD guide ship for guiding students for their PhD.He is recently promoted to Dean Research and Development.
title: Research – TKR College Of Engineering & Technology
